info.name: Twitter Matte Gray Dark UI + Custom Fonts + tweaks
info.description:
✅ Twitter Dark Theme based on Tweetbot Night Mode Color scheme (popular Twitter client for iOS)

Extras:
✔ Hide Promoted Tweets, Ads, Who to follow & other twitter web Clutters.
✔ Option to Choose between 5 different fonts (default: Open Sans)
✔ Wider timeline
✔ Optimized for RTL Languages: فارسی ، عربي , Persian (Farsi) , Arabic, Urdu
info.additionalInfo: ✔ امکان انتخاب بین ۵ فونت فارسی: - Sahel ساحل - Vazir وزیر - Shabnam شبنم - Samim صمیم - Noto Naskh نوتو نسخ / فونت اندروید ✅ Twitter Dark Theme based on Tweetbot Night Mode Color scheme (popular Twitter client for iOS) Extras: ✔ Hide Promoted Tweets, Ads, Who to follow & other twitter web Clutters. ✔ Option to Choose between 5 different fonts (default: Open San) ✔ Wider timeline ✔ Optimized for RTL Languages: Persian (Farsi) , Arabic, Urdu ✔ امکان انتخاب بین ۵ فونت فارسی برای توییتر ✔ الجميل العربية الخط If something messed up send me a tweet or direct msg @S3micolon My Other Styles For: Twitter, Facebook, Gmail, inbox by Google & Wikipedia : https://userstyles.org/users/345801
